trigger_description: This trigger fires for an account that is on a dynamic pricing plan such as the Residential Hourly Pricing program or other real time market rates whenever the average price changes.
Indicates whether the carbon is clean or dirty

trigger: Peak Time Savings - Savings Hours Announced
trigger_description: This trigger activates whenever Peak Time Savings Hours are announced and during various stages of an event.

trigger: Manage your Carbon Footprint - Change in carbon intensity
trigger_description: This trigger fires whenever the carbon intensity changes for the ComEd service territory, use this trigger to help lower your carbon footprint by reducing your energy during high carbon times
